<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Logging Account</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v1/cloudAccounts/awsLoggingAccounts/{loggingAccountId}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Update details of the logging account.

## Request
